missing_perms.self: I lack the permission `{permission}` for this.
missing_perms.self_channel: I lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this.
missing_perms.other: You lack the permission `{permission}` for this command.
missing_perms.other_channel: You lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this command.

errors.request_error: There was an error while handling the request. Make sure that my message wasn't deleted and thet I have sufficient permissions!
errors.title: Error
errors.unknown:
Something went wrong! {EMOTE_WARNING}
Report this error to `{owner}`!

misc.info:
Hey there {user}!
My prefix on this discord server is `{prefix}`
Run `{prefix}help` for a list of commands.

eval.no_args:
You didn't provided code to evaluate.
Usage: `{prefix}eval <code>`

help.description:
List all available commadns the bot has.
You can add the name of a command after it, to recieve some additional info about that specified command.

command_info.no_command:
The provided command (`{command}`) doesn't exist!
Make sure you typed it correctly.

Category names need to be prefixed with `cat:` (e.g. `{prefix}help cat:voice`)!
command_info.title: Command help: {command}

description.command_value:
To get more info about a specific command run `{prefix}help [command]`.
You can also run `{prefix}help cat:[category]` to show the commands of a specific category.
description.nav_value:
Click the buttons for the following actions:

Previous page
Next page
Cancel menu
description.support: If you need help with the bot, contact the owner `{owner}` for support
